page.title: 19HOME LIFE
page.content: { "My name is Raymond Gates. I moved to Harlow six years ago from Walthamstow. My aunt already lived in Harlow. My dad is a lorry driver and he still works from London. There are four in our family. My mum, dad and older sister, Tracy. We live in a three-bedroom house on an estate called The Maples. All the houses there are Canadian design and a few years ago children from our school planted some maple trees there. They are still standing. I am a 3rd year in my junior school and there are 29 children in our class. My favourite subject is maths and I like working on the computer. I stay at school for dinner and I bring my own sandwiches. At dinner time I
